New Records: Dasun Shanaka brought up his fifty off 20 balls, the fastest by a Sri Lankan in men's T20Is
Key Match Events: Umran Malik took 3 wickets for 48 runs
Axar Patel took 2 wickets for 24 runs
Dasun Shanaka took 2 wickets for 4 runs
Kasun Rajitha took 2 wickets for 22 runs
Suryakumar Yadav and Axar Patel added 91 runs off 40 balls for the sixth wicket
Dasun Shanaka bowled the final over, took two wickets, and helped his side get over the line
Miscellaneous Highlights: India were left to rue a top-order collapse and five no-balls from Arshdeep Singh
Sri Lanka racked up 206 for 6 in their 20 overs
India were reduced to 57 for 5 in the 10th over
Sri Lanka hammered 93 runs in the last six overs
